mapper.select: SELECT rc.id, m1.nickname AS reporterNickname, m1.id AS reporterId, rc.original, m2.nickname AS writerNickname, m2.id AS writerId, crt.type as reportType, rc.processedAt FROM reportedComment as rc JOIN member as m1 ON rc.reporterId = m1.id JOIN comment ON rc.commentId = comment.id JOIN member as m2 ON comment.writerId = m2.id JOIN commentReportType AS crt ON rc.typeId = crt.id LIMIT #{offset},#{size}
